+Experiment package#

+Experiment.@BCFS class#

class +CFS.+Experiment.@BCFS.BCFS#

Breaking continuous flash suppression.

Derived from @CFS.

fixation = None#

@Fixation object.

frame = None#

@CheckFrame object.

masks = None#

@Masks object.

screen = None#

@CustomScreen object.

stimulus_break = None#

@BreakResponse object.

subject_info = None#

@SubjectData object.

trials = None#

@TrialsData object.

+CFS.+Experiment.@BCFS.load_parameters(obj)#

Precalculates and updates parameters for every oncoming trial.

Loads parameters from trial matrix and then precalculates other parameters that depend on initialised window, i.e. masks, stimulus, fixation parameters.

+CFS.+Experiment.@BCFS.run(obj)#

Executes the breaking CFS experiment.

First initiates the experiment, then for every trial update parameters, shows fixation crosses, flashes masks and stimuli, records responses, writes results and shows rest screen.

+Experiment.@CFS class#

class +CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.CFS#

Base for @BCFS and @VPCFS classes.

Describes common methods for CFS experiments, e.g. flash() for flashing stimuli/mondrians etc. or initiate() for initiating CFS properties.

vbl_recs = None#

An array for recording flip timestamps while flashing.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.addprop(obj, prop_name)#

Adds new dynamic property and records its name.

Parameters

prop_name – Name of new property.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.flash(obj, vbl)#

Flashes stimuli, masks, fixations and checkframe.

This is the main method for flashing CFS and recording its timings.

Parameters

vbl – An integer for vertical retrace timing from the fixation.show().

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.get_dyn_props(obj)#

Returns a list of dynamic properties.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.initiate(obj)#

Makes all the preparations for the CFS experiment to run.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.initiate_window(obj)#

Calls basic Psychtoolbox settings.

Adopted and modified from Peter Scarfe’s Psychtoolbox tutorial.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.preload_stim_and_masks_args(obj, stim_props)#

Precalculates DrawTexture args for stimuli and masks for a trial.

Parameters

stim_props – A cell array of chars with names for stimuli properties.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.show_farewell_screen(obj)#

Flips screen to the farewell.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.show_introduction_screen(obj)#

Flips screen to the introduction.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.show_preparing_screen(obj)#

Flips screen to inform that the experiment is being prepared.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.show_rest_screen(obj)#

Flips screen to the rest message.

+CFS.+Experiment.@CFS.wait_for_keypress(obj, key)#

Waits until the provided key is pressed, then continue.

Interrupts the experiment if shift-esc was presses.

Parameters

key – A char array with the PTB key, check KbDemo for more info.

+Experiment.@VPCFS class#

class +CFS.+Experiment.@VPCFS.VPCFS#

Visual priming continuous flash suppression.

Derived from @CFS.

fixation = None#

@Fixation object.

frame = None#

@CheckFrame object.

mafc = None#

Either @ImgMAFC or @TextMAFC object.

masks = None#

@Masks object.

pas = None#

@PAS object.

screen = None#

@CustomScreen object.

subject_info = None#

@SubjectData object.

target = None#

@TargetStimulus object.

trials = None#

@TrialsData object.

+CFS.+Experiment.@VPCFS.load_parameters(obj)#

Precalculates and updates parameters for every oncoming trial.

Loads parameters from trial matrix and then precalculates other parameters that depend on initialised window, i.e. masks, stimuli, fixation, pas and mafc parameters.

+CFS.+Experiment.@VPCFS.run(obj)#

Executes the visual priming CFS experiment.

First initiates the experiment, then for every trial loads parameters, fixation cross, flashes masks and stimuli, shows PAS and mAFC questions, records responses, writes results and shows rest screen.
